title: Pirate Bard skin

embed.description: pirate bard skin idea #argh Pirate Bard

body: Lost me legs to the portal kraken matee but i got me orange booty.......what do you  mean why am i glowing

replies.body: This may be the best Bard concept I've ever seen. Wow.
Thank you matee
"Matey", he says. How appropriate for this skin  =P
Not gonna like, this is awesome. O.O Pirates vs Ninjas, Pirates op
or want to recruit him as part of his ship.  Then again... they could both have a piece of eight.
I mean..there is Spooky Gangplank so..yeah.
So?  There are other pirate skins, too.

> or want to recruit him as part of his ship. 

Spooky GP looks just like Pirate Bard in this sketch is what i mean so they would most likely team up is what i was referring to.

Great skin! Imo the meeps should be parrots, though :-)

Would probably be called "Deep Sea Bard" because of the conch shell and the meeps being little sea monsters, not to mention Kraken portal :D
